channel.title: RegeX is for hire: coding
channel.description:
Desperation for the win.
Anyway, I will do coding for reasonably cheap =), PayPal. Please don't ask me to make a new bot for the new RuneScape engine.
I am willing to code projects very seriously, if interested drop a line to regecks@tpg.com.au
If this blatant advertising is not allowed, feel free to delete =).

item.title: RegeX is for hire: coding
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“Sean, post:109, topic:3669”][quote author=ruler link=topic=4459.msg50552#msg50552 date=1150695526]

i am col!

spammer…

If im being paid, I actually work m8

PLUS regex cant design for the life of him, proven fact.
[/quote]Lol like you’d know, you’re stoned 90% of the time, and drink the rest.

Considering you admit it alot, and I joined aryan to clean up your horrible mess m8? Nuff said, go back to kiddie’s school

can i use your classloader in a non-aryan derivitve, bot?

Im guessing there is another Pyro round other then me the srl dev.

Yes the one who owns Elitescape.

He offered me hosting when I was in proccess of making my crap RoBot. I took him up and made some forums. I only did this because I thought I could update. When really, I accidentially copied ruler’s output instead of the one out of my aryan updater. Thus, a working bot. Neonknight persuaded me into letting him join the team. He kept bugging me to update, but I was too busy. When I tried to one day, I failed, discombobulated. He claimed I stole their output, and refused to accept my sorrow and story. He then fabricated some convo with some other guy saying that me and Slayer (I guess you would call him another dev) were begging him to get us Ruler’s output. He posted all that crap on the front page of Gimpsoft. I got mad. Then I figured, if I accidentially updated my bot with their output, couldn’t I update their crap pay bot with anyone elses output? So I opened my old folder of IMP Aryan and Nerice’s newest Aryan. Updated the methods in IMP’s bot and plugged in Nerice’s output. I disabled most of Gimpsoft’s protection. I didn’t even think about Nerice having a trigger for all the traps. Hey, working IMP Aryan, that’s all I cared about. So without testing, I posted this on my forums. When Nerice told me about his stuff, my sides changed. Instead of helping all the noobs and giving them free IMPAryan, I was using that against them. They’d use a trapped up IMP Aryan, and most likely get banned. Then Ruler said he was DDOSing Elitescape for having Nerice’s Output and their files on his server. I told him that it was my stuff and said I’d take it off if he wanted, and explained what happened. He said nah that they doubted him and he would still continue attacking anyways. Their site got owned and they had to get new hosting I think.

sigh

Thanks for being truthful. also to know who mr x is use the search function on this post. If you hate mr x, then you probably hate jews also or you support ripping and scamming.

on a sidenote, RegeX does know java and he can definently lead a team to design good systems, look at shell bot.

#1 yeah sure whatever dosen’t bother me

#2 he knows java (atleast in the form of knowing it to be able to code - what defines ‘knowing’ java?), but that says nothing about system archietecture. Don’t get me wrong, im not saying that regex can’t code. I am meerly stating that he has learnt very little about design (his own personal choice) and thus would be better suited to well thought out programs (with possibly even uml and design statements) than a fresh hard project himself.[/quote]
awesome, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: RegeX is for hire: coding
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Pyro:

Im guessing there is another Pyro round other then me the srl dev.

Yes the one who owns Elitescape.

He offered me hosting when I was in proccess of making my crap RoBot. I took him up and made some forums. I only did this because I thought I could update. When really, I accidentially copied ruler’s output instead of the one out of my aryan updater. Thus, a working bot. Neonknight persuaded me into letting him join the team. He kept bugging me to update, but I was too busy. When I tried to one day, I failed, discombobulated. He claimed I stole their output, and refused to accept my sorrow and story. He then fabricated some convo with some other guy saying that me and Slayer (I guess you would call him another dev) were begging him to get us Ruler’s output. He posted all that crap on the front page of Gimpsoft. I got mad. Then I figured, if I accidentially updated my bot with their output, couldn’t I update their crap pay bot with anyone elses output? So I opened my old folder of IMP Aryan and Nerice’s newest Aryan. Updated the methods in IMP’s bot and plugged in Nerice’s output. I disabled most of Gimpsoft’s protection. I didn’t even think about Nerice having a trigger for all the traps. Hey, working IMP Aryan, that’s all I cared about. So without testing, I posted this on my forums. When Nerice told me about his stuff, my sides changed. Instead of helping all the noobs and giving them free IMPAryan, I was using that against them. They’d use a trapped up IMP Aryan, and most likely get banned. Then Ruler said he was DDOSing Elitescape for having Nerice’s Output and their files on his server. I told him that it was my stuff and said I’d take it off if he wanted, and explained what happened. He said nah that they doubted him and he would still continue attacking anyways. Their site got owned and they had to get new hosting I think.

sigh

item.title: RegeX is for hire: coding
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“GenoDemoN, post:97, topic:3669”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=4459.msg48143#msg48143 date=1150337812]
Nerice, when you say smacker has something coming, please don’t attack him.

Smacker does not host fagex anymore, firefag got a new host. All that smacker hosts right now is azn-hosting and whoever is with us on that. Afelhem is hosted on it too, smacker isn’t even part of runescape cheating anymore. He quit all rs forums(more like got banned ). All you’d be accomplishing is slowing down our server again and making me frustrated.
[/quote]

or like when we “crashed the sever” and you lost all data? lol. honestly you guys dont know what nerice did. he was only only one to crack the sbot3 authorization that im sure alot of you used. hes the only one who updated aryan every single time. hes the only one who was looking at byutecode modification in the loader before the engine update. shos some respect and you all wodner why you end up with sour bot makers who only will realse the programs if they get money.[/quote]

Well smacker lied to me on that one, but in either case he sent in money to webhostplus and I have no idea why.

How is asking Nerice not to attack the server that my site is hosted on being dis-respectful? I don’t even have a clue what your talking about, that was pretty random.

Read full topic
